title: Antonio and Sabrina
description: Sabrina’s life changed fifteen years ago when she married Antonio De Luca, mob boss of the De Luca Cartel. She was young and naive about the way the cartel lifestyle worked. Now that Antonio has solidified the family’s name, their world comes crashing down from past secrets she knew couldn’t stay buried. Is this Sabrina’s punishment for falling in love with a mob boss? Or can her children be safe without the De Luca Cartel?
author: Chiquita Dennie
